Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: ~ales For the context of the new channel configuration library, is there still a reason that the signatures we submit to fabric nodes should always be in low S form?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: ~ales Still looking for your input on this one whenever you get a chance!

Action.author: caod
Action.body: Going to just close this out since we're wrapping up part 1 of config soon and there doesn't seem to be much activity on this.
